title: Ford has an AI assistant and new hands-free BlueCruise tech on the way
description: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.
content: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.
